Laura, Creative Boss Lady & Bestest Photographer.

Laura Laws
Photographer

Thank you for visiting my website, I hope you can find everything you need to make your choice of photographer. Please don't hesitate to contact me if you need further information.

I have worked as a photographer for nearly 18 years now and have been thrilled to win many awards. The studio ethos is to provide an enjoyable experience whatever your requirements with no hard sell. I have been honoured that many of my clients come back through the years to update their family portraits. I have now seen toddlers become uni students and it warms my heart!

My photography covers: newborn, portraits, weddings, corporate - including website images or commercial - including pack shots - please view the individual galleries for examples of work or 'choose a shoot' for information and pricing. The studio is by appointment only and located in Gawcott near Buckingham.

I look forward to seeing you - Laura
